Identification_Area.title: BepiColombo MPO MPO-MAG CRUISE DERIVED AVERAGED IB Sensor Science Data 2023-08-03T00:00:08.000Z - 2023-08-03T23:59:59.000Z

Citation_Information.author_list: HEYNER D., RICHTER I., AUSTER U., BERGHOFER G., FISCHER D., MIETH J., GLASSMEIER K.-H.
Citation_Information.description: This data product contains DERIVED 1-Second-AVERAGED Magnetometer data of the BepiColombo MPO MPO-MAG IB sensor in ECLIPJ2000 coordinates. The covered time period is 2023-08-03T00:00:08 - 2023-08-03T23:59:59. Observations have been made during the mission phase: CRUISE.

Modification_Detail.description: This is version 1.0 of this product, generated by raw2cal version 20231103 at 2023-12-23T03:09:36. It is the first official version released to the archive. Data have been calibrated using static calibration file version V2.24 of 2023-12-21.

Primary_Result_Summary.description: This file contains DERIVED 1-Second-AVERAGED Magnetic field vector data obtained by the IB magnetometer aboard the BepiColombo MPO s/c. All field values are GROUND CALIBRATED data in NANOTESLA and averaged to 1-Second-Mean values. The field is given in ECLIPJ2000 coordinates. These data were calculated using the results of the ground calibration only. This means that temperature dependent sensitivities, misalignment, and offsets of the instrument are taken into account. All s/c effects like time dependent disturbances and the s/c magnetic field are not eliminated yet. Only a stepwise constant estimate of the s/c field is subtracted. For proper scientific research "DERIVED INFLIGHT CALIBRATED" data should be used.

bc_mpo_mag:Instrument_Status.bc_mpo_mag:mpo_status: MPO attached to MTM and MMO

Table_Character.name: MPOMAG DERIVED 1-SECOND-AVERAGED CALIBRATED SCIENCE DATA TABLE
Table_Character.description: This table is a character table containing the archived 1-Second-AVERAGED CALIBRATED science data of MPO-MAG.

Field_Character.name: TIME_OBT
Field_Character.description: S/C clock at observation time: P/SSSSSSSSSS:FFFFF P: Partition of the s/c-clock SSSSSSSSSS: Relative seconds after t0 FFFFF: Fractional non decimal seconds running until 65535

Field_Character.name: PosX
Field_Character.description: S/C position X component, ECLIPJ2000 coordinates. Value is given in KILOMETER. The s/c position is stated as the distance to SUN.

Field_Character.name: PosY
Field_Character.description: S/C position Y component, ECLIPJ2000 coordinates. Value is given in KILOMETER. The s/c position is stated as the distance to SUN.

Field_Character.name: PosZ
Field_Character.description: S/C position Z component, ECLIPJ2000 coordinates. Value is given in KILOMETER. The s/c position is stated as the distance to SUN.

Field_Character.name: FieldValX
Field_Character.description: Magnetic field X component, 1-Second-AVERAGED CALIBRATED data, ECLIPJ2000 coordinates, IB sensor. Value is given in NANOTESLA.

Field_Character.name: FieldValY
Field_Character.description: Magnetic field Y component, 1-Second-AVERAGED CALIBRATED data, ECLIPJ2000 coordinates, IB sensor. Value is given in NANOTESLA.

Field_Character.name: FieldValZ
Field_Character.description: Magnetic field Z component, 1-Second-AVERAGED CALIBRATED data, ECLIPJ2000 coordinates, IB sensor. Value is given in NANOTESLA.

Field_Character.name: SensTemp1
Field_Character.description: Temperature of the magnetic field sensor measured by the temperature sensor T1, Value is given in DEGREES CELSIUS. Value is averaged to a 1-Second-MEAN Value.

Field_Character.name: SensTemp2
Field_Character.description: Temperature of the magnetic field sensor measured by the tempearature sensor T2, located at the sensor heater, value is given in DEGREES CELSIUS and averaged to a 1-Second-MEAN Value. THIS VALUE IS CORRUPTED DUE TO A LOOSE CONTACT. DO NOT USE!

Field_Character.name: ElecTemp
Field_Character.description: Temperature of the MPO-MAG electronics measured by temperature sensor T_ELEC, Value is given in DEGREES CELSIUS and averaged to a 1-Second-MEAN Value.
